ext_description.p: A Packaged_connector_component is a type of and a type of that is an occurrence of a .
ext_description.example: Figure illustrates a member of Packaged_connector_component that is a socket.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: the interface_access_mechanism is an inverse relationship that specifies that the existence of the Packaged_connector_component is dependent on the existence of the that specifies the Packaged_connector_component as its . There shall be one or more for a Packaged_connector_component.
the derived_from specifies the role of the for the Packaged_connector_component.

ext_description.p: A Packaged_connector_component_interface_terminal is a type of . The Packaged_connector_component_interface_terminal indicates explicitly that the object is an interface terminal of a connector and that the terminal will never be connected to the circuit board or substrate.
ext_description.note: In the context of system simulation and test, a Packaged_connector_component_interface_terminal may represent a cabling or external connection interface. Further, it provides the exact geometric location of the terminal, whereby the exact geometric location of a mating terminal may be checked to determine whether the physical connection zones of the two interface terminals mate properly.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: the associated_component specifies the role of the for the Packaged_connector_component_interface_terminal.
the definition specifies the role of the for the Packaged_connector_component_interface_terminal.

ext_description.p: An Interface_mounted_join is the relationship that specifies the connectivity between a terminal on a component and the terminal on a socket in the assembly that directly mates with that component terminal.
ext_description.example: An example of this relation is pin 1, a , on U1, an integrated circuit and a component, that is connected to pin 1, on XU1, a socket and an , when the IC is inserted into the socket in the assembly.
ext_description.note: This Application object is not referencing the terminal on the socket that mates with the base interconnect substrate. That is referenced by a member of .

ext_descriptions.ext_description: the access_to_interface_mounted_component specifies the of the being interfaced to the assembly by the specified by connection_to_interconnect_module_component for the Interface_mounted_join.
the connection_to_interconnect_module_component specifies the that mates with the specified by access_to_interface_mounted_component for the Interface_mounted_join. The is a terminal of the .
